bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Andrew Hopewell Hepburn was one of the principals of Perry, Shaw, and Hepburn, the architectural firm selected by Rev. WAR Goodwin and John D. Rockefeller, Jr to complete the restoration of Colonial Williamsburg

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: One sheet containing several sketches. Used for consideration during initial planning of Williamsburg Inn.
